name: 15urlshortner
description: URL shortner 1- create a shortened URL, redirecting the user to the previously provided URL. 2- Also, keep track of total visits/clicks on the URL. 3- Routes     1- POST/URL - Generates a new short URL and returns the shortened URL in the format example.com/random-id.     2- GET/:id - Redirects the user to ther original URL.     3- GET/URL/analytics/:id - returns the total clicks for the provided shortened id.
